Service_Center_RepresentativeObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Service_Center_RepresentativeObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Service_Center_RepresentativeObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Service_Center_Representative_Workday_Ac.description: A unique identifier for the Service Center Representative.

System_User_Data.description: The user name the new user will use to sign on to Workday.

validation.validation: The entered User Name is longer than the current tenant maximum.  The tenant max is set to [max].

System_User_Data.description: The number of minutes the user may be idle before the system requires them to re-enter their user name and password.

validation.validation: Session Timeout Minutes must be greater than 5 and less than or equal to [max]. The default value is [default].
validation.description: Validates that the timeout setting is between 5 and 720 minutes.

validation.validation: Session Timeout Minutes must be greater than 5 and less than or equal to [max]. The default value is [default].

System_User_Data.description: The user is prevented from signing on to the system.
The user will be prevented from signing on to the system after this date (Pacific Time).
The user is prevented from signing on to the system until their account is unlocked.
The user will be required to change their password upon initial sign on.
The web browser title will include the user name in parenthesis.
The user will be presented with an icon to view reports as an RSS feed.
The user will have the Workbox tab available in the right-side slide-out.

System_User_Data.description: Notification Type Configurations for a particular user
The initial password the user will sign on with.

validation.validation: The password does not meet password requirements.
validation.description: Validates that the password conforms to the configured password rules.

System_User_Data.description: The system should generate a random password for the user.
True when the user is exempt from Delegated Authentication, False otherwise.  Set this element to true if you want the user to be exempt from delegated authentication.
True when the user is exempt from One-Time Passcode Authentication, False otherwise.  Set this element to true if you want the user to be exempt from one-time passcode authentication.
True when the user's One-Time Passcode grace period is enabled, False otherwise.  Set this element to false if you want the user's one-time passcode grace period to be disabled.
The remaining number of times the user can login without providing a one-time passcode. This cannot be higher than the configured tenant maximum grace period login count.
This field is used for OpenID based authentication and contains the email address associated with the OpenID account.  This value needs to be provided to enable OpenID authentication for this user.
This field is used for OpenID based authentication and contains the OpenID GUID. It will be unpopulated until the user completes an initial successful OpenID authentication attempt.

This field is used for OpenID Connect based authentication and contains the OpenID Connect subject. It will be unpopulated until the user completes an initial successful OpenID Connect authentication attempt.
To enable user preferences that simplify the overall user experience.

Service_Center_Representative_Workday_Ac.description: Element containing Service Center Representative Workday Account data.

validation.validation: User Name already taken, please choose another one.
validation.description: Validates that the user name provided is not already in use by another system user.

validation.validation: Password is required when creating a new Workday Account.
validation.description: Validates that a password is provided (or will be generated) for a new Workday account.

validation.validation: Unable to Generate Random Password due to missing email address for notification.
validation.description: Validates that an email address is available if the random password option is specified.
Validates that the code provided matches one of the locale codes in the Workday system.

validation.validation: One-Time Passcode Exempt cannot be modified if the user is not required to use One-Time Passcode Authentication.
One-Time Passcode Grace Period Remaining Login Count cannot be modified if the user is not required to use One-Time Passcode Authentication.
One-Time Passcode Grace Period Enabled cannot be modified if the user is not required to use One-Time Passcode Authentication.
One-Time Passcode Grace Period Remaining Login Count cannot be less than 0 or greater than the tenant Maximum Grace Period Login Count: [max count]

description: Element containing Service Center Representative Workday Account data.
